statements: DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity <= 10 AND min_quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE order_quantity < 10 AND order_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2002 AND supplier_name LIKE 'Vendor%';
DELETE FROM stock_history WHERE change_reason = 'Expired' AND item_id = 2002;
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE item_id = 101 AND current_stock < minimum_stock;
DELETE FROM stock_updates WHERE quantity_added <= 0 AND update_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
